name: Rabbit Liver Pate
quantities: 3 livers, 4 shallots, 4 cloves garlic, 6 tbsp butter
recipe:
1. Clean livers
2. Cook livers (2 minutes per side)
3. Turn heat down, add shallots, garlic, fresh herbs
4. Add cognac
5. Remove from heat, allow to cool
6. Add more butter and cream
7. Blend
8. Transfer to dish
9. Pour melted butter on top to seal it.
